data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My favorite person is my cousin Fran. She ____ a ____ nice ____, ____ lives ____ my ____. She ____ from France, ____ she ____ with ____ aunt ____ uncle. She ____ 13 ____ old, but ____ much ____. She is in 8th grade.
data.partBlankContent: My favorite person is my cousin Fran. She i_ a ve__ nice per___, a__ lives i_ my to__. She co___ from France, wh___ she li___ with m_ aunt a__ uncle. She i_ 13 ye___ old, but se___ much ol___. She is in 8th grade.
data.fullContent: My favorite person is my cousin Fran. She is a very nice person, and lives in my town. She comes from France, where she lived with my aunt and uncle. She is 13 years old, but seems much older. She is in 8th grade.
data.answer: 我最喜欢的人是我的表妹Fran。她是一个非常好的人，住在我的镇上。她来自法国，和我的叔叔婶婶住在一起。她13岁，但看起来老得多。她上八年级。
